title: Topic 001 Question 044
body: A company has an Amazon S3 bucket that contains critical data. The company must protect the data from accidental deletion.
Which combination of steps should a solutions architect take to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
options: Enable versioning on the S3 bucket.
Enable MFA Delete on the S3 bucket.
Create a bucket policy on the S3 bucket.
Enable default encryption on the S3 bucket.
Create a lifecycle policy for the objects in the S3 bucket.
